revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=Stub|a&e-work-group=yes|needs-photo=yes|listas=Bryant, Anthony J.}} {{WikiProject United States|class=Stub|importance=Low|IN=yes|IN-importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Dungeons & Dragons|class=Stub|importance=Mid | b1 = no | b2 = | b3 = yes | b4 = | b5 = no | b6 = }} {{WikiProject Military history |class=stub | b1 = no | b2 = | b3 = yes | b4 = | b5 = no |Historiography-task-force=yes }} }} ==Untitled== Anthony Bryant is a well known writer of Samurai books. (ref. amazon.com) Please add Curriculum Vitae. The Sengoku Daimyo website is a valuable research tool containing unique information. *author provides online information, difficult to find in English == Date of death == Anthony died 25 December 2013. Obituary will be linked when available. Sourced through his personal Facebook account: https://www.facebook.com/anthony.bryant.3990 Goodbye, old friend. We all miss you. [[Special:Contributions/75.129.136.224|75.129.136.224]] ([[User talk:75.129.136.224|talk]]) 07:37, 27 December 2013 (UTC) :Obit - http://dailyjournal.net/view/obit/16748/#.Ur5O3bCA3IU [[Special:Contributions/2601:D:9400:3CD:1832:F6F1:843D:46A8|2601:D:9400:3CD:1832:F6F1:843D:46A8]] ([[User talk:2601:D:9400:3CD:1832:F6F1:843D:46A8|talk]]) 04:12, 28 December 2013 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[Anthony J. Bryant]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=744456921 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20060221082600/http://www.rencentral.com:80/archives/bryant.shtml to http://www.rencentral.com/archives/bryant.shtml *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20061016121857/http://www.ospreypublishing.com/author_detail.php?author=A1962 to http://www.ospreypublishing.com/author_detail.php?author=A1962 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=true}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 09:56, 15 October 2016 (UTC)
